Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Status of Harry Guild
Dear Sir,
Harry Guild has an AVG of .213 at AA Scituate Somersets!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/10/1983
Subject: Well...
I am rather upset that I do not play regularly.
I wish to be traded if that doesn't change!

Regards,
Michael Hebron

change, trade me!

Regards,
William Boydston
